name: K2-224
scenarioDescription:
The K2-224 Exoplanetary System

K2-224 is a star with 0.91 times the mass of the Sun, and 0.84 times its radius. It is located 905.74 light years away from the solar system.

K2-224 is known to have 2 exoplanets in orbit around it.

K2-224 c

K2-224 c was discovered by the K2 observatory using the transit method. Its semi-major axis is 0.09 astronomical units, as compared to Earth's which is 1 astronomical unit. It takes 10.09 Earth days to complete an orbit around its host star, K2-224.

The mass of K2-224 c is 7.94 times the mass of Earth. The radius of K2-224 c is 2.41 that of Earth. At 7.94 Earth masses, K2-224 c is a so called Super Earth. Super Earths could be terrestrial worlds like Earth, but they could also be ocean worlds or terrestrial worlds wrapped in a substantial atmosphere, in which case some refer to them as Mini Neptunes. No Super Earths are known to exist in our solar system, but if it exists, the so-called Planet Nine could very well be a super Earth, as it is hypothesized to have a mass between five and ten Earth masses.

K2-224 b

K2-224 b was discovered by the K2 observatory using the transit method. Its discovery was announced in 2018-02. Its semi-major axis is 0.05 astronomical units, as compared to Earth's which is 1 astronomical unit. It takes 4.48 Earth days to complete an orbit around its host star, K2-224.

The mass of K2-224 b is 2.79 times the mass of Earth. The radius of K2-224 b is 1.56 that of Earth. At 2.79 Earth masses, K2-224 b is a so called Super Earth. Super Earths could be terrestrial worlds like Earth, but they could also be ocean worlds or terrestrial worlds wrapped in a substantial atmosphere, in which case some refer to them as Mini Neptunes. No Super Earths are known to exist in our solar system, but if it exists, the so-called Planet Nine could very well be a super Earth, as it is hypothesized to have a mass between five and ten Earth masses.
description: 3D visualisation and gravity simulation of the exoplanet system K2-224, which contains 2 planets and was discovered by K2.
